DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine consumption whey protein , compare soy protein carbohydrate food decrease blood pressure along reduce risk factor heart disease .
DOC.detailed_description: Several line evidence suggest consumption dairy food , specifically whey protein , may reduce blood pressure . This propose study design investigate effect whey protein compare another protein source . Since blood pressure recognize risk factor cardiovascular disease , clear evidence whey protein reduce blood pressure , dietary recommendation may make regard whey protein intake . However , dietary recommendation consume whey protein mean improve health status must science-based . Results study provide scientific basis dietary recommendation regard whey protein intake .
DOC.criteria: BMI 25 42 kg/m2 Fasting glucose < 126 mg/dl Blood pressure > 120/80 < 160/100 mm Hg [ base two measurement collect separate day ] Use prescription overthecounter medication alter blood pressure . Presence kidney disease , liver disease , gout , certain cancer , thyroid disease , gastrointestinal , metabolic disease , malabsorption syndrome . Women give birth previous 12 month . Pregnant woman woman plan become pregnant become pregnant study . Lactating woman . Type 2 diabetes require use oral antidiabetic agent insulin . History eat disorder dietary pattern consistent dietary intervention ( e.g. , vegetarian , low fat diet , high protein diet ) . Volunteers routinely participate `` heavy '' exercise volunteer initiate exercise program study . Volunteers lose 10 % body weight within last 12 month . Use vitamin mineral supplement antacid contain magnesium calcium . Use prescription overthecounter antiobesity medication supplement ( e.g. , phenylpropanalamine , ephedrine , caffeine , least 6 month prior start study ) history surgical intervention obesity . Active cardiovascular disease ( heart attack procedure within past three month participation cardiac rehabilitation program within last three month , stroke history/treatment transient ischemic attack past three month , document history pulmonary embolus past six month ) . Smokers tobacco user ( 6 month prior start study ) . Known ( selfreported ) allergy adverse reaction dairy product ( include lactose ) soy . Unable unwilling give inform consent communicate study staff . Selfreport alcohol substance abuse within past twelve month and/or current acute treatment rehabilitation program problem ( Longterm participation Alcoholics Anonymous exclusion . ) Other medical , psychiatric , behavioral factor judgment Principal Investigator may interfere study participation ability follow intervention protocol .
